root.name: Heroes Phantasia
root.description: Heroes Phantasia is a crossover JRPG for the PlayStation Portable, with characters from nine different anime series. It is being developed and published by Namco Bandai, and features a battle system similar to Valkyrie Profile's. CharactersBlood+: Saya Otonashi The main character of Blood+. A katana-wielding chiropteran Queen. Hagi A chiropteran Chevalier, and Saya's bodyguard.Darker Than Black: Hei The main character of Darker than Black. Hei, also known as the "Black Reaper", is a Contractor with the power to generate and manipulate electricity. He is an expert martial artist and wields a knife attached to a metal wire. Suou Pavlichenko An ally of Hei's, Suou is a Contractor with the power to materialize an anti-tank sniper rifle.My-HiME: Mai Tokiha The main character of My-HiME. She has power over fire. Natsuki Kuga An ally of Mai's. Natsuki wields a pair of hanguns with unlimited ammunition. Mikoto Minagi A good friend of Mai's. Mikoto wields a two-handed sword. Midori Sugiura Midori wields a double-edged axe. Sgt. Frog: Sergeant Keroro The main character of Sgt. Frog, and the leader of the Keroro Platoon. Corporal Giroro The Keroro Platoon's weapon expert. Sergeant Major Kululu The Keroro Platoon's tech expert. Lance Corporal Dororo Dororo is the Keroro Platoon's ninja assassin. Private Tamama The youngest member of the Keroro Platoon.Sorcerous Stabber Orphen: Orphen Cleo Everlastin Majic Lin Read or Die: Yomiko Readman Nancy Makuhari Rune Soldier Louie:Louie s-CRY-ed: Kazuma Ryuhou Slayers Revolution: Lina Inverse Gourry Gabriev
